name: Dead Hospital
description:
The main character: a patient who regains consciousness after a long coma, he does not know or remember his name, or how he got here.
All around-the darkness and the frightening silence of the hospital.
The horror of this story begins with the first minutes of searching for at least some clues.
There are no people there, just darkness, silence, and a small flashlight.

Your task:
- Search all the rooms, find the reason for the disappearance of people.
- Solve the mystery of the dead hospital
- Find the code that will help you open the exit door.
- Find a way out and don't die, remember that there is something terrible lurking around every corner.
There is a light in the hospital, but is it worth going there? You'll find out soon enough.

The game will take you back to 2012 in the time of screamers and scary sounds, be ready!
Sensitive people should be careful
You will find:
- Nice graphics
- Good management
- Atmospheric and scary music
- Unexpected and scary situations that will make you feel a sense of fear
- More than 10 rooms of horror
- More than 20 scary elements
- Co-op, play together with your friends
